mentions.tacticalSituation: Nearly 200 seats across the UK could be decided by Remainers voting tactically for the Liberal Democrats. The tactical advantage or the Liberal Democrat wins will come down to how many Labour supporters lend their vote to the Liberal Democrats. The Liberal Democrats have the best chance to win seats from the Conservatives, keeping them from a majority. But only if enough Labour supporters back the Liberal Democrats this time.

issues.brexitEurope: A vote for anyone other than the Liberal Democrats can end up with an MP who backs Brexit.

quotes.text: Recent polls show the Liberal Democrats are the most popular party for Remainers.

images.caption: Mike Smithson, Polling and Elections Expert

leaflet.additionalNotes: Mike Smithson, Polling and Elections Expert, discusses tactical voting considerations for Remainers in the election in Watford.
